remarks: Closure of vector subtraction in a subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lssvsubcl.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lssvsubcl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssvsubcl $p |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ ( X e. U /\ Y e. U ) ) -> ( X .- Y ) e. U ) $.
